description.english: Construct a ladder on your vehicle

description.english: Use WASTE mode to attack subtarget

description.polish: Użyj tryb ZNISZCZ, aby zaatakować cel podrzędny.

displayName.french: Il reste un peu de place
displayName.spanish: Aquí hay hueco para más gente
displayName.russian: В тесноте, да не в обиде

description.english: Increase the size of your crew
description.french: Agrandir l'escouade
description.german: Vergrößere deine Crew.

description.english: Complete a mission without any crew members becoming incapacitated
description.french: Terminer une mission sans qu'aucun membre d'escouade ne soit neutralisé
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, ohne dass ein Crewmitglied außer Gefecht gesetzt wird.

description.schinese: 在没有任何队员失去行动能力的情况下完成任务
description.tchinese: 在沒有任何隊員失去行動能力的情況下完成一個任務
description.russian: Завершить задание так, чтобы ни один член экипажа не потерял сознание

description.english: Use photo mode

description.english: Narrowly avoid being eaten by a sandworm

description.japanese: クルーの最大人数を上限まで増加させる
description.portuguese: Aumenta ao máximo o tamanho da tua tripulação

description.italian: Massimizza la dimensione dell'equipaggio
description.polish: Osiągnij maksymalny rozmiar swojej załogi.

description.english: Defeat the Orator in The Sandworm Graveyard

description.tchinese: 在沙蟲墳場擊敗演說家
